choices: stay with the shrunken Parents POV
1.content:
It was a normal day in the Smith Household, Ed was upstairs, working on his shrinking machine, able to reduce objects, (and organics) to toddler-bite-sized.

That day, Ed and Kathy were about to go on a romantic dinner, and they 'hired' one of the cousins of the family, Erin Johnson, to babysit Eric and Jack.

Ed ran up to his little room, Kathy followed him, mainly because she wanted to see what her husband was up to every day.

"Look Kathy, with this, we could be rich!" Ed touched a panel of buttons as Kathy settled down on a couch placed in front of the device! The device roared to life, as Ed jumped forward to get Kathy out of the way, it fired!

Oh crap, someone entered the door right after the parents got their berings...
1.title: And so it begins

11.content:
The door creaked open-

"Don't worry, I'll get us out of this" Ed said, trying to calm down his hysterical wife.

"What if it's Jack? I don't want to be eaten! Or Eric, he might do something!"

"Don't worry, nothing bad is going to happen."

Is he right?
11.title: Oh Man, not-

111.content:
The soft patter of footsteps sounded on the carpeting, with little, naked except for a little sesame street diaper around his waist, Jack thundering into the room.

"Cwol Bwugs!" Jack was reaching for the little couple...
111.title: It's Jack!

1111.title: Your Choice

We have to run! said Ed, "We're gonna end up feet decorations! Both of them run, but its no use, Jack squishes them!

The parents both end up eternally smelling his feet.

11112.content:
Jack picks them both up, opens the elastic on his diaper and drops them in. He then sits down on his diapered butt bringing Kathy and Ed with him. The pressure of Jack's butt is very heavy on Kathy and Ed

"Oh God. How much do we feed him" moaned Ed as he struggled to stay upright

"Well. Judging by how he's sitting on us, a lot" replied Kathy

A while later Jack's stomach begins to rumble. Kathy and Ed hear it as well.

"OH! Please let him be hungry" said Ed

What is it?
11112.title: Crush them with his diaper

111121.content:
Jack's stomach rumbles in great hunger. He remembers that his parents are in his diaper, so he takes them out.

"Please Jack! Don't eat us!!" Ed says to his son, as Jack takes his parents closer to his big mouth, opening to accept his snack.

Jack does not care for what Ed has to say to stop him. The parents are tossed into their son's mouth, and swallowed into his big, rumbly belly.

"Jack!! Let us out, please!!" Kathy yells in her son's stomach. The parents begin to pound on Jack's stomach walls, has the growls and grumbles of his belly surround them. *GRRRUMMMMBBBLE* *GLOOORRRP* *BLOOOOORRP*

Jack feels his parents' struggles and enjoys it. He rubs his big belly as it fills with gas that has already rendered the parents unconscious. Jack's expression changes as he feels a huge belch coming on...

*UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRPPP* "Ahh..." Jack's belly rumbles, digesting the last of his parents.
111121.title: Be careful what you wish for

111122.content:
Jack shifted his weight and stood up "MOMMY!" Jack ran out of the room to find his mother, who would certainly help him with his diaper about to fill. His stomach rumbled again, and he suddenly remembered the bugs. He grabbed the bugs out of his diaper and set them on the table "Stay dewe! i gots to go!" Jack stood there, feeling his diaper getting less roomy.
The parents held their noses, as they were little, their noses smelled more than the average one. Jack shifted his weight on both feet, sort of like a dance, and whined at his uncomfortable state.. until he heard someone calling his name and he turned to see...
111122.title: Ready to fill his diaper?

choices: She doesn't notice, and the parents are once again in a diaper prison
1111222.content:
"PHEEEEEEW!" Erin's voice could be heard, the shockwaves of her exclamation shaking the parents to their cores. "Did baby Jacky do a stinker?" Erin's hand went for the waistband of his Pamper, her looking down the back to survey the damage. "Wowsers lil guy, that's a lotta poopy you just made!" She lifted Jack up into her arms, the baby grabbing the two 'toys' he had left on the table. The parents who had previously Awww'ed at his little diaper dance that shook the fresh feces into his diaperseat were now deathly quiet, scared. Surely they could trust Erin, couldn't they?

"ERIN!" they shouted, however, at that time, Jack's hiney went active, producing a thick wet fart into his packed Pamper.

"Phew! Lil jacky still making poopies?"

"Nuhhhh..." Jack replied, before Erin lifted him back up.

"One poopy Jacky coming in for a landing!" Erin smiled, laying Jack onto the changing table, the tot giggling at the little game she was playing with him. His parents clasped in his little fist, Jack laid out his arms and spread them, lifting his legs up to allow Erin some access to his diaper. Erin got out the neccesary supplies, and untaped Jack's diaper.

"Wow kid, you're worse than your brother" Erin chuckled, Eric hadn't pooped yet... she'd have a heck of a job ahead of her if he didn't go in the potty.

Jack smiled, then shivered as the wipes cut away at his fresh 'creation.' "I know buddy, they're cold... dear gawd you're so stinky!" Erin gagged.

"Glad I'm not the only one who thinks that way" Ed broke the silence with a little joke.

"Shush!" Kathy whispered, trying to cut down the sound. From their prison they noticed Erin lift Jack's legs, sliding out the old poopy Pamper and sliding a new one into place.

"Darn it. Forgot the powder." Erin looked down at the diaper she had just rolled up, turning around to toss it into the pail and to get the powder. Jack however decided to use this time for something else.

Jack lifted up his fist, opening it up over his new diaper, one with his favorite cartoon character, Simba the lion, adorning its front. "Diapa! Diapa!" Jack chuckled.

"You got it little dude, that's a diaper!" Erin giggled, grabbing the powder and moving back over to Jack's table. "Okay little guy, ready for a blizzard?"

Jack nodded a bit, and Erin opened up the powder container's nozzle...
1111222.title: Diaper change!

choices: "So, as for the many times I've gone unpaid..."
"We need to get you help. Now."
11112221.content:
Erin was about to squeeze and shake the powder when she noticed two buglike things in Jack's new Pamper...

"Mister and miss Smith?" She was surprised, dropping the powder onto the table. You- you- you're tiny?"

Ed spoke up. "Yes Erin- you saved us- thank you, thank you SO MUCH!" Ed and Kathy were incredulous. "You saved us."

Erin grinned. "I guess I did, I couldn't imagine being wrapped up against a cute lil' kid's bottom like yours." She began to look around.

"Well..."
11112221.title: Saved! Or not...

choices: Tails. Parents get rolled up and tossed!
111122211.content:
"So. Now that I'm in a good position here... as for the many times I've gone unpaid..." Erin grinned.

"Unpaid?" Ed and Kathy looked at each other. They had been using Erin for a while now as their babysitter, they knew her parents, and despite them telling their daughter she didn't need payment for her services, she had been wanting payment.

"Your mom said she didn't want you paid" Ed said.

"Really? Hmmf. Knew it. Well you could have done it anyway."

"We needed your mom's and dad's permission, Erin." Kathy replied. Erin just pouted, crossing her arms.

"Well now that you're behaving like that..." her pout developed into a wolfish grin. She had something hidden in her mind...

"What are you grinning at?"

"Oh nothing" Erin smiled, placing the parents back on the changing table as she finished diapering up Jack, setting him loose. She took out a coin, and grinned again
"Since I'm bigger, and can make the rules, I have a little game. Heads, I toss you into dinner. Tails, You spend tonight in the diaper pail."

"WHAT?" Ed and Kathy replied, angry, but praying they got tails... at least smelling their diapers would be better than...

Erin flipped the coin.
111122211.title: Unpaid revenge.

choices: Climbing down the changing table we go!
1111222111.content:
"Well would you look at that!" Erin smiled. "It's heads! Good thing the kids are having oatmeal tonight! Something so soft and silky for you to ride down into their tummies..."

"No. Erin. No. I refuse."

"You can't refuse, little bugs." Erin chuckled, then sang and taunted. "You're gonna be ba-by poo..."

Knowing they couldn't escape, they had to accept their fate as Erin moved into the kitchen to cook the kids' dinner.

"We need to do something- escape- now"

"Kathy calm down" Ed nodded. "We'll have to run. I know."

The parents sat down, and using a marker and a Pamper nearby, they began to draw out their plans...
1111222111.title: Lunchtime!

11112221111.content:
"OOOOHHH BOYS!" Erin smiled, placing the hot bowls of oatmeal on the dinner table in the family room. She walked into the living room, seeing the changing table.

"Aww, lil' bugs drawing on the big babies' diapers?" She snickered. "For shame... Poor Simba didn't deserve to be written on." She walked out of the room with the two parents in her clenched fist. She approached the table and started holding her fist over one of the bowls of oatmeal. "Eenie, meany, miney, mo.." she began to rhyme, moving her hand over each bowl.

"And you, are, not, it!" She dropped the parents, screaming, into the soupy muck below. Their vision obscured by oatmeal, they couldn't notice who was sitting where. However, after the food reasonably cooled off, they scraped the muck off their faces, looking right into the smiling face of...
11112221111.title: Erin comes back. Food done!

111122211112.content:
"Eric..." Ed looked up, scared. His son was dressed in his usual lounging attire, a shirt with characters from The Lion King, his absolute favorite movie, as well as his Lion King sweatpants, deep below that was his Lion King adorned Pamper. The kid was obsessed, he even had a plush lion he named "Mufasa" that he never slept without. Ed and Kathy had even played with him when he imagined he was a lion, roaring and hunting with members of the family. Little Eric was obsessed with lions.

A scary thought. Eric would clear his bowl.

"Eat up, my little lion" Erin noogied Eric's head, the young boy letting out a hearty "RAWR!" as he took a spoon and dug in, scooping masses of oatmeal up into the air and into his mouth, where it was slowly mushed before it went down into his gullet. Right where Erin wanted the two to go.

"See ya when you're a pile of Eric's shit..." Erin pouted and smiled. The five-year-old's spoon began to lift up near Ed's position...

And began to lift Kathy up into the sky to her doom.

"ED!" She extended an arm, Ed gripped her arm, however he was also lifted high up into the air, headed toward their son's gleaming white chompers.

"RAWR!" Eric grinned. "Time ta be lion food!" he dumped the spoonful into his mouth and began chewing, all the while moving his parents toward the chasm at the back of his throat...

"No Eric- no, NO!" Ed and Kathy began to shout, to no effect however.

"RAWR! INTO MY TUMMY!" They could hear Eric's voice getting louder... all of a sudden they felt the sensation of being lifted, then tossed- right into the deep dark chasm of Eric's throat, being squeezed by his esophagus until they ended up in the dark bag of muscle known as Eric's stomach. The place was becoming packed with oatmeal, old and newly arriving. Soon the mechanisms of nature would be tripped...
111122211112.title: A Lion's Meal...

1111222111121.content:
Ed took a step, sloshing through the muck. Kathy however looked and shouted at Ed.

"Hon! Don't move- if you do, his stomach..." They could hear sounds, Eric's heartbeat, then a deep rumbling.

"That's not gas, is it?" Ed gulped, gagging on the gas within their son's belly.

"It is. It's what happens when he swallows air, or wolfs down food too fast."

Their surroundings shook.

"That wasn't gas." Ed became worried. In a corner of the pit they were in, the oatmeal began floating up as a liquid began seeping into Eric's tummy. When it made contact with Ed's shoes, they began to melt away.

"ACID! HELP!" Ed shouted, Kathy began shouting.

"ERIN! HELP US! WE'RE GONNA BE DIGESTED!"

Much to their dislike, Erin was outside, collecting the bowls, she noticed Eric's one empty. With a smile, she walked over to him.

"Heya my big fierce lion!" She patted his belly. "How's that food doing?"

"It's in my tummy Erin!" Eric replied, each pat making Ed and Kathy lose their footing... should they lose it...

Another strong pat later, Both parents were on their sides, completely being bathed in the acids of their son's stomach. Screams of theirs were silenced by Eric's mighty lion roar impersonations.

"And what's gonna happen to the oatmeal inside my big fierce lion?"

"Dunnos..." Eric replied.

"It's gonna turn into ewwies!" Erin smiled, rubbing his belly and putting her ear to it. No screams... the parents had already begun a sleep they would never awake from, deep in the depths of Eric's mighty five year old stomach. A few minutes later, the kid plopped down in front of a TV, playing video games on his new console that his parents had given him as a gift. Deep within him though, the parents were disintegrating into soup, nutrients bound for different parts of Eric's body, his growing legs, his brain, and even some 'baby fat'. This is what presented the chyme as it worked its way through the mighty 'Lion's" digestive tract. Eventually, a few hours later, Eric did indeed feel something.

Within him, a sphincter opened, spilling excess soup into his colon, where it would be dried out, pushed, and packed into his rectum for later disposal. A fearsome lion's meal ended only naturally, as a fearsome lion's dung. Another hour later, Erin noticed Eric fall into a position where his legs were staggered. By now, Ed and Kathy were nothing but greenish-brown remenants of their former selves. "Poopified" in Jack's terminology.

With a smile, Eric began to squat, his young bowels automatically releasing the load into his Pamper's seat. Erin was prepared.

"Is my little lion making some dung?"

"Uh huh-" Eric quickly replied, grunting as he passed another log, this one containing the bones of his former parents, now reduced to poo, into the seat of his Pamper.

"PHEW! I didn't know lions were big stinkers." She looked down the back, noticing a log sitting in his diaper pockmarked with white 'flecks.'

"I did know they were big poopers."

And so began the parents' new lives. After Eric was wiped up, the wipes were laid in the diaper, as Erin unceremoniously rolled up the diaper and tossed it in the pail.

A few days later, when the parents didn't show up for work, the police were called. As the CSI team navigated through the house, no one bothered to check the diaper pail. When Erin moved the bag inside to the outside trash, they didn't bother. Not even when the garbage man came, emptying the diapers and the parents' remains into the back to be crushed.

Eventually, the diapers ended up on a conveyer belt, headed to the county's incinerator. At the end of the day, what was once "Eric the lion's" pile of dung was now particles of dust spread through the air... no part of them ever identifiable.

Not bad for being a piece of Eric dung!
1111222111121.title: A Lion's Dung

1111222112.content:
They got lucky as they got tails. "Well, it looks like dirty pail time," Erin said with a smirk. Ed and Kathy were relief about it, as they prefer spending a night in the stinky pail then being eaten.

"Now, lets see. Either wet or messy diaper," Erin said as she grinned.

"How about letting us go?" Kathy suggested, but Eric couldn't hear her.

"I know! I would put in you into...."
1111222112.title: Tails. Parents get rolled up and tossed!

11112222.content:
And let loose, the powder sprayed out, covering the parents in it, blending them in completely with the absorbent polymer of Jack's Pamper.

"RAWR!" Erin giggled, obviously playing the role of Simba the lion, the cartoon character that adorned Jack's diaper. "I'm goin' onna baby's butt!"

"Ahh! Wion!" Jack giggled, kicking his legs happily.

"Hey, at least he's cute!" Erin broke character, then went back to the voice of Simba "Yup, I agree!" Ed and Kathy had to giggle, then snapped back to reality. Simba was their prison, and knowing Jack, where he had pooped before, this time his breakfast, it was only a while until lunch worked its way through his system and slid out of his bottom.

"RAWR!" Erin taped up the diaper, leaving the parents in darkness. The parents heard a pat from above as Erin patted the baby's front and smiled, rubbing it a bit and then picking up Jack, going off to search for Eric. She went outside- setting Jack in the grass, leaving the baby to his own devices. All the while, his parents were at his mercy, and could notice the smiling lion imprinted above them, reminding them that they were in their son's diaper now, at his mercy.
11112222.title: Simba: the crinkly prison

1112.content:
Kathy caught sight of the kid reaching toward her like she was a popular toy. She screamed, but Jack was called out of the room for a second and left.

"What's wrong? Jack doesn't eat bugs"

"Yes he does! Look in his diaper the next time you change him, you can see little ants in it!"

Jack thundered back into the room- Eager to wonder what these new bugs tasted like, and if they liked seeing the inside of a diaper. The fate of the couple now rested in the hands of a 2 year old. Either they would meet his stomach, or have the possibility of meeting his meals from yesterday...

Jack bring both of them up to his little face smiling at Ed and Kathy. They couldn't help but smile. He was there baby and he was about to shun them into his diaper prison. "Now what do we do, were stuck!" Cried Ed

Kathy had a feeling that it was going to come. Being the one who is usually in charge of his changing it was bound to happen at this time. A large fart was released from Jack making them moan and feel sick to their stomach. "Dear god that's awful!" cried Ed.

" He's only getting stated." Kathy said as a yellow liquid filled the diaper. Soon they were partly submerge in very thick pee and were experiencing the worst feeling in there life. After soaking in the pee and excramint, the second wave came in. The brown menece cover them mushing into there faces and causing Kathy to pass out. Ed was soon to follow. When they came to Jack was being changed by

"Wow you made a bad one Jack. Eric don't play with that!"

She cleaned up the rest of the poop with you in it and was about to throw the diaper and them away. You finally decided to start jumping around to get her attention. She bent over to look at the poop to see what was in it. With her fingers she lifted you up to her face.

All of a sudden a beam hit Jack who had just crawled into the room causing him to grow 10 ft. "Awesome," yelled Eric who ran toward the confused but happy Jack. He ran straight between Jack's legs and climbed up his diaper to start talking to Jack."Wow how did you do that? what does it feel like?" Of course Eric was oblivious to the shrink/growth ray. "Awesome"

11121111121.title: Erin gets Jack shrunk while she changes him

choices: He had another feeling, complete opposite of the last one, he was shrinking!
He was growing again! (his diaper does eventually stretch to size)
11121111122.content:
(not included in the last chapter, Erin changed Jacks diaper with the coincidentally bought super-stretch diapers in the diaper bag his family had out for the baby sitter in Jack's room)

After growing to 100 feet, Eric looks over the town. Erin quickly thinks and plans to shrink them both back down to normal size. She aimed the ray at Eric (being sure to make it shrink) and he is reduced to about his normal size, give or take a couple inches. After she prepares the gun for another shot, it causes a surge at the wall outlet, destroying the parts of the machine--it was useless, and Jack was still 100 feet tall! Erin tries to shoot the laser at Jack, ignoring the smoke, it sends out one last zap, but it has enough energy to cause Jack to GROW to 200 feet.

Jack looks down on all of the houses in the areas, and picks Erin and Eric up and puts them in his diaper. Jack was just changed recently so he doesn't need to go for a while. Jack hears the horns honking in the city, his curiosity peaks, and he "waddles" over the "short" distance of 2 miles. (about the length of his house when he was small) He tripped over an empty semi trailer, after lying on his stomach for about 10 minutes he decides to crawl over to the city. Picking up the cars and shaking the people out of them, then puts them in his diaper with the rest of the family and Erin as he goes. After making it to the city, Jack looks at the 20 story buildings, since the regulation height for a floor in the city was 9 feet, the buildings were still 10 feet lower than him. He easily crawled over several buildings to get to his center of attention: A two story day care center. It was Monday so parents were eager to drop off their kids and get to work to finally have them out of their hair.

Jack Lies on his stomach as low as he can (with his head tilted up to see inside of the building) and all the kids (from 1 year-3 year olds) immediately grin when they look out the window at his soft face. Jack reached into the building (easily breaking most of the windows from his 5-foot wide pudgy fingers. After reaching in he grabbed all of the children in it and shoved them into his diaper along with the other poor souls. As Jack gets up he wants to play with the buildings. After trying to pick one up, he realizes he can't. And as if on cue, there was a side affect to the ray he received from the surge in his house, causing him to reach 500 feet. Only allowing him to pick up small business offices and one-story houses. When he looks down he sees, what seems like a toy tank to him, a high-powered military tank with 5 foot thick steel walls (they came prepared!) and 12" (inch [1 foot]) wide bullet shells with tranquilizer darts in them. When they fired the first shot, Jack jumped to the ground being very interested with this tank, the rumble made the pilot enter the wrong coordinate and fire just between his legs, into a fire truck happening to be rolling his way. (the fire truck will have nothing to do with the story.... unless someone else wants it to be)

The second fire is a direct hit, and just as Jack loses interest, the dart hits him really close to his heart, so the tranquilizer spreads instantly through his body, causing him to fall onto the tank, the 5-foot steel walls (sounds pretty sturdy though) actually weren't meant to withstand 600 tons of 2-year old, causing the tank to be crushed (poor people, might have been better off in his diaper). Upon waking up, Jack was lying on his back in a net being carried by 90 Tandem Rotor helicopters (here is an image url to give you a better picture of what this kind of helicopter is: http://www.enemyforces.com/helicopters/c...) with a net which, to Jack, looked like rope, but was actually millions of chain-links which were about 2 feet wide, and said to hold 5 tons each. All the people that were in his diaper were now on his belly waiting for air rescue before the helicopters started the move. Most of the people were sitting down to regain their balance from the dizzying journey in his diaper. The children were not rattled (confused/nauseated, as in no sense of direction) at all since they were in there for about the time he fell over, not much motion. Most of the people notice he's awake since he's starting to breathe more heavily. They all soon start to notice since they were being shoveled back into his diaper by his, now 2 story-wide arm. Even though the helicopters are ready to move, Jack did sleep for about 10 hours before they actually got him off the ground.

Getting the chains around him was no easy task. They had to burrow under the street and thread the chain through there. Some parts of Jack squished into the holes, so they had to dig deeper. Jack was about 10 feet off the ground. Traffic (not a wise choice anyway) was beginning to flow underneath him after the police decided to open up the road. There was so much traffic under him since everyone wanted to see this "giant baby" which was told to them by their friends. There was a crowd about as much as an average Super Bowl game standing on the entire block. Jack had another one of those feelings by now, he was growing, and he was growing fast. Soon the chain links broke from the force of the growing baby, causing him to fall. He put his hands and feet down, amazingly killing absolutely 0 people (I don't like the blood and gore, if you do put it on the next chapter).

Jack's diaper lost it's expandable-ness and was barley making it around his 2-block-wide, baby-smooth belly. Jack was now 1000 feet tall (about as tall as the empire state building) The people in his diaper noticed the diaper wasn't expanding so they had less room... down there. They were getting pretty used to being forced to be in a diaper. That is until he directed his attention on the mass crowd of people who were starting to flee for their lives... (or their, free-from-being-in-a-diaper-life). The people closest to him weren't exactly his first target. He smashed about 5 buildings and placed them around the edge of the crowd, keeping them confined. At once he took out the helicopters that were circling above him. (heh... gently setting them down on near-by buildings) Jack started loading his diaper full of the people in the crowd. As he sifted through the crowd, he stopped at one person, and asked that person if he likes him (the last him is Jack) in his 2-year-old vocabulary... "You like Jack?" The person replied with a simple nod, being terrified by being in his hand which was longer and wider than his own house. After getting his reply, he put that person on his shoulder and continued putting the rest of the people in his diaper.

He stopped... but why?

(really sorry about the length if you don't like to read)
11121111122.title: Ahh, not a cloud in the... Jack?

111211111221.content:
Jack had 100 people already in his diaper. He reached to grab more, but he felt a strange feeling throughout his body. He put his hands on his stomach. He started to shrink. The people on the ground were happy that the giant toddler was shrinking. His clothes were shrinking with him, but the people inside his diaper stayed the same size. They could tell that he was shrinking because they could see that they had more space than before. As he shrunk past 500 feet the space started to shrink again. The captives were thinking that soon the diaper was going to rip. Then he stopped shrinking at 200 feet tall. Everybody, both inside and outside his diaper, started to panic again
.
Jack smiled at the toys in the street. This caused the citizens to start screaming. They looked around for an escape route. Every route they had was blocked by rubble, but then they noticed one escape route. That route would take them right between Jacks giant legs and beneath his diaper.. The citizens looked up at him and hoped that they would be let go. Unfortunately, that was not what Jack had in mind. He felt that he already had enough people trapped in his diaper. Then another idea came into his young mind. He giggled at the little bugs and shouted out, “Twoys go squish”.

Everyone below screamed and, taking a chance, started running towards him. Jack just slammed his diapered butt into the pavement. Crunching and cracking sounds could be heard as Jack’s weight crushed several people and caused the ground to crack. Jack giggled as he felt the ground crack and blood stain his diaper. Several of the people did escape, but Jack didn’t care. Somehow all the people on the inside survived. Jack wanted to do it again. He stood up again and the people seized the opportunity and started running. Jack shouted out, Buggies meet my diapa”. He sat down again crushing several more people, but a couple more people escaped. Now Jack had about another 20 terrified people right in front of his blood stained diaper.

info.brief_description: Be either a parent, kid, or babysitter!
info.description:
The Smith family is one of those weird families, sort of like the parents from the "Honey I Shrunk the Kids" type. The Parents are:

Ed Smith: Has built and is experimenting with shrinking technology. Married to Kathy Smith, his wife. Father of Eric and Jack Smith. Age 32

Kathy Smith: Normal housewife who helps her husband with work. Married to Ed Smith, her husband. Mother of Eric and Jack Smith. Age 31

Eric Smith: 5 Year old kid, normal but loves to misbehave, Changes Jack's diapers rarely...

Jack Smith: 2 Years Old, Toddler. Wears Diapers

Erin Johnson: Babysitter for the Smiths, does not know about the shrinking technology. can tolerate a wild household. Age 15.

Story should be detailed, and imagine this event is actually happening, written in 3rd person "Ed" or "Erin" No Magic Portals, Vore is preffered with the kids.
